multimonster.common.pipe
Class BufferedChannel

java.lang.Object
  multimonster.common.pipe.Channel
      multimonster.common.pipe.BufferedChannel
public class BufferedChannel
extends Channel

A Channel to transfer data which uses a RingBuffer.

Author:
Jörg Meier

Specified by:
read in class Channel
Parameters:
length - - the number of bytes to read Read Data out of the channel. read() blocks when there is no more data in the channel and continues when there is data again to transfer. returns a new byte[] with the length of read bytes
